    • Constructor Detail

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(int x,
            int y)
        Constructor of the class. The respective club is initiated with the same coordinates as the ogre. It is assumed the ogre is not of top of the key neither is its club. The ogre starts unstunned.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the new ogre.
        y - The y coordinate of the new ogre.

    • Method Detail

      • setOn_top_of_key

        Changes the value of the on_top_of_key variable.
        Parameters:
        on_top_of_key - New boolean value for on_top_of_key variable.

      • setClub_on_key

        public void setClub_on_key(boolean club_on_key)
        Changes the value of the club_on_key variable.
        Parameters:
        club_on_key - New boolean value for club_on_key variable.

      • getClub

        public Character getClub()
        Returns the ogre club.
        Returns:
        The ogre club.

      • setClub

        public void setClub(Character club)
        Changes the ogre's club.
        Parameters:
        club - New ogre's club .

      • getTurns_stunned

        public int getTurns_stunned()
        Returns the number of turns the ogre has been stunned consecutively since last time.
        Returns:
        The value of the turns_stunned variable.

      • setTurns_stunned

        public void setTurns_stunned(int turns_stunned)
        Modifies the number of turns the ogre has been stunned consecutively since last time.
        Parameters:
        turns_stunned - New value for turns_stunned variable.

      • isOn_top_of_key

        public boolean isOn_top_of_key()
        Returns true if the ogre is on top of the key.
        Returns:
        The boolean value of the on_top_of_key variable.

      • isClub_on_key

        public boolean isClub_on_key()
        Returns true if the club is on top of the key.
        Returns:
        The boolean value of club_on_key variable.

      • addClub

        public void addClub(int x,
                    int y)
        Adds a new club to the ogre. This function serves the same purpose as setClub(), however, due to the name of the Character class, it was needed to create another function that constructed the club itself.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the new club.
        y - The y coordinate of the new club.

      • move

        public void move(GameState gs)
        Sets the value of the (possible) next X and Y coordinates in a random fashion.
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.

      • action

        public void action(GameState gs)
        Defines what the ogre will do according to its possible coordinates. The Ogre will only move if the nx and ny coordinates point to an empty space, the key or another ogre. After the ogre has moved (or not!) he will swing its club and perform the correspondent action with it.
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.

      • swing_club

        public void swing_club(int cn)
        Defines the club's new possible coordinates randomly.
        Parameters:
        cn - A random int from 1 to 4: 1 - Above; 2 - To the right; 3 - Below; 4 - To the left.

      • smash

        public void smash(GameState gs)
        Checks the club's action according to the next possible coordinates. The club will only appear on the map if the value of its nx and ny coordinates point to an empty space or to the key.
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.
